title: 现在可以预定MINECON独家物品
author: zx728925
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zx728925 于 2017-10-4 21:52 编辑 





QQ截图20171004213709.png (210.94 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2017-10-4 21:41 上传





Exclusive MINECON Earth merch available now, including the (blue?turquoise?) sheep! Click the link to find out more
独家MINECON地球物品现在发售啦，包括（蓝色？蓝绿色）的羊！点击链接获取更多信息https://minecraft.net/zh-hans/minecon/#merch





QQ截图20171004213719.png (281.47 KB, 下载次数: 2)

下载附件

2017-10-4 21:41 上传





Exclusive swag delivered direct to your door - Available to order now!
独家物品直接送达到你家门口 - 现在可以预定啦！

You can now order exclusive MINECON:Earth merch from J!NX and Target sites – including limited edition tees, caps and the blue wonder that is the turquoise sheep! - and get it all delivered in time for the big day. Just make sure you order your merch from J!NX before FRIDAY THE 13TH (aargh!) if you want it guaranteed to arrive before the big day!你现在可以预定从我们的合作伙伴的网站上预定独家MINECON地球的物品 - 包括限量版T恤、帽子以及蓝色奇迹之蓝绿色的羊！ - 然后我们会为了这重要日子及时派送。如果你想要保证在这重要日子之前你的物品派送到你家门口的话，只要在下周五（13号）之前预定就可以了（啊！）！
OR, from October 8th, you can leave the house and visit a Target store (you can do it! We believe in you!) and buy all your awesome MINECON merch in person! So you’ll get fresh air, exercise, and (most importantly) exclusive merch! What's not to like?或者，从10月8号开始，你可以到外面去，选定一家商店，然后去那个商店逛逛（你能行的！我们相信你！），然后亲自购买所有你想要的精美的MINECON独家物品！所以你会呼吸新鲜的空气，会得到锻炼，以及（最重要的）独家物品！你完全没有理由不喜欢这种方式的！
